text:
@Naveen_Odisha Money don't buy life
Money only saves life
Money don't bring dead human to life
Money only saves a dying human from dying
Believe truth rather than dying 
A spiritual healing balm for coronavirus is available
Order for the cure before it becomes too late
Life is precious
Dm now
